<h3 align="center">JavaScript utilities for JavaScript applications</h3>

<hr/>

Version 0.1.0  


#### Installation
--------
```console
npm install lesli-js --save
```


#### Usage
--------
```js
var leslijs = require("lesli-js")
leslijs.debug.message("Hello, test debug message")
leslijs.colors
```
